E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 5/26/1992
Subject: Progress of Mike J. Grace
Dear Sir,
Mike J. Grace has an ERA of 1.59 at A Vero Beach Dodgers!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/27/1992
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Dave Stieb



Date: Wednesday, 5/28/1992
Subject: Progress of Charles Johnson
Dear Sir,
Charles Johnson has nothing more to prove at AA San Antonio Missions!
He has an AVG of .276 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
